scenarios.name: Scenario 1 — No ST01 logic, balanced
scenarios.purpose: ST01=0 and no secondary imbalance; default should follow counted qty.
scenarios.expected_output: Scenario 1. Default SetLocationQtyTo = counted qty. No Investigate. No ST01 MIN/MAX shown.

scenarios.name: Scenario 2 — ST01 eligible, count within MIN/MAX
scenarios.purpose: ST01 logic active but count is plausible; default should stay at system.
scenarios.expected_output: Scenario 2. Default SetLocationQtyTo = system qty. Reason shows ST01 MIN/MAX and 'within range'.

scenarios.name: Scenario 2 — ST01 eligible, count BELOW MIN
scenarios.purpose: Count below plausible range; default should snap down and show below-MIN explanation.
scenarios.expected_output: Scenario 2. Default SetLocationQtyTo = counted qty. Reason shows ST01 MIN/MAX and 'below MIN by X'.

scenarios.name: Scenario 2 — ST01 eligible, count ABOVE MAX
scenarios.purpose: Count exceeds plausible range; default should snap down to MAX.
scenarios.expected_output: Scenario 2. Default SetLocationQtyTo = system + outside tolerance. Reason shows ST01 MIN/MAX and 'above MAX by X'.

scenarios.name: Scenario 3 — No ST01 logic, unbalanced secondary
scenarios.purpose: Secondary excess would drive default negative; clamp default to zero without Investigate.
scenarios.expected_output: Scenario 3. Default SetLocationQtyTo = 0. No Investigate. Reason shows balancing and residual.

scenarios.name: Scenario 4 — ST01 eligible + unbalanced secondary (Investigate)
scenarios.purpose: ST01 logic active and secondary imbalance forces negative default; Investigate must trigger.
scenarios.expected_output: Scenario 4. Default clamped to 0. Investigate header. Reason shows ST01 MIN/MAX and residual.

scenarios.name: Investigate guidance — Transfer to Default
scenarios.purpose: Scenario 4 where an Available/UPR secondary has excess stock.
scenarios.expected_output: Investigate. NEXT guidance recommends physically transferring residual qty to Default.

scenarios.name: Investigate guidance — Check ST01 inflated
scenarios.purpose: Scenario 4 where secondary excess exists but is NOT Available/UPR.
scenarios.expected_output: Investigate. NEXT guidance recommends checking ST01 inflation.

scenarios.name: Hard-stop — Missing Location Master
scenarios.purpose: Any missing location master should force Investigate and suppress adjustments.
scenarios.expected_output: Investigate. Reason indicates Missing Location Master. No SetLocationQtyTo outputs.

scenarios.name: No variance — clean pass
scenarios.purpose: All system quantities equal counted quantities; recommender should do nothing.
scenarios.expected_output: No adjustments. GroupHeadline = No variance. No Investigate.
